description:
There is quite a bit of commotion in the Soul Society as an explosion at the Shishinro Repentance Cell marks the declaration of war by Jin Kariya.  The  Bounts are causing a raucous and exhibiting their power in Kusjishi, the roughest part of the Rukon District, while the entire Soul Society prepares for the unavoidable war.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya no Ketsui! Gekitotsu no Toki Semaru
Hitsugaya`s Resolution! The Moment of Conflict Approaches
La décision de Hitsugaya ! L`heure de la confrontation approche
日番谷の決意! 激突の時迫る
